item.title: ECOM6029 Cases and Relevant Materials
item.description: Overview Since this course is mainly focus on the discussion and cases, the note will only provide some cases and relevant materials for review. Cases Nintendo’s Disruptive Strategy: Implications for the Video Game Industry Facebook: Facing off Against Tencent Apple: How to Grow on Chinese Soil Walmart China: Challenging Alibaba’s New Retail Lenovo: Being on Top of a Declining Industry Daksh and IBM Relevant Materials From Mental Models to Transformation: Overcoming Inhibitors to Change How to Plan E-Business Initiatives in Established Companies Innovating Across the Business Model Business Model Analysis for Entrepreneurs Reinventing Your Business Model
